<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/sync/account/{accountId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Synchronous API for processing payment slips to an specific account.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
